name: Avventure dell'Altro Mondo (LocJam IT entry)
description:
Proposta di traduzione EN-IT di Adventures from Another World per la LocJam 2021.

Team members: Cristina De Tora (https://sselep.itch.io/), Eleonora Fabbri (https://itch.io/profile/elyanne), Claudio Lenato (https://itch.io/profile/claudiolenato), Maria Luisa Piemontese (https://oujidere.itch.io/), Paola Poletti. 

Translated and edited using OmegaT CAT Tool

(our first LocJam, our first project together since graduation, we had a blast!)
